name: Wander (itch) (AustralianSenior)
description:
Find the switch to open the temple door! Solo game by Kathryn Hyde, for her capstone RMIT Game Design project.
NOTE: Game has no coded ending; please use Escape to quit.

Controls: 
A and D / Arrow Keys - Move
W / UP - Jump
SPACE - Interact
ESC - Quit 

Attributions:
- Music: Magical forest thingy (prototype) by Wampino https://opengameart.org/content/magical-forest-thingy-prototype
- Ambience: More forest sounds.wav by genghis attenborough https://freesound.org/people/genghis%20attenborough/sounds/28108/
- Footsteps: Running.02.wav by stintx https://freesound.org/people/stintx/sounds/107624/
